{title of the article}

{date of the article}

{three separate paragraph elements}
Hint: You will need to use createElement more than once here! Your function should take either an object as it's one argument, or 5 separate arguments mapping to each piece of the data object above. Step 2: Add an event listener to the expandButton span. This event listener should toggle the class 'article-open' on the 'article' div. Step 3: return the entire component. Step 4: Map over the data, creating a component for each oject and add each component to the DOM as children of the 'articles' div. Step 5: Add a new article to the array. Make sure it is in the same format as the others. Refresh the page to see the new article. */
